item.title: Active Directory Notes
item.description: AD Delegation Unconstrained Delegation Finding computers/users with unconstrained delegation: AD Module Get-ADComputer -Filter {TrustedForDelegation -eq $True} Get-ADUser -Filter {TrustedForDelegation -eq $True} Powerview Import-Module .\PowerView.ps1 Get-NetComputer -Unconstrained Get-NetUser -Unconstrained Exploiting (from a Windows box) daskdalkas Constrained Delegation Finding computers/users with constrained delegation . .\PowerView.ps1 Get-DomainUser -TrustedToAuth Get-DomainComputer -TrustedToAuth Exploiting (from a Windows box) Ask a TGT to impersonate the user allowed to delegate privs firstly (lab.
